import.title: Data import
import.fileupload_emptyFile: The selected file is empty. Please choose another file.
import.fileupload_wrongFileType: The selected file is not a xml file. Please choose a xml file.
import.fileupload_parsingError: An error occured while validating the selected xml file. Please ensure that the selected xml file is well formed.
import.fileupload_loadDataError: An error occured while importing the selected file. Please review the selected file.
import.fileupload_success_snackbarMsg: The selected xml file was imported succesfully.
import.importedDataAvailable_hint: You can continue working directly with the data from your previous planning. If you select and import a new xml file, the data from your previous planning will be deleted.

error.NonValidNumber: The input was not a valid number or smaller than 0!

production.title: In-house production
production.planned_stock: planned stock at the end of the period

error.planned_stock: Planned stock at the end of the period must be bigger than 0!
error.current_stock: Current stock must be bigger than 0!
error.in_queue: Orders in queue must be bigger than 0!
error.in_process: Orders in process must be bigger than 0!

error.no_orders: No production orders could be found for sequence planning.
